DOC.brief_title: SELINE : Second-Line Iressa Phase IV Study NSCLC Patients
DOC.criteria: Pathological Diagnosis local advanced/metastatic Non Small Cell Lung Carcinoma Previously fail firstline chemotherapy Patient provide sample EGFR mutation test Central Nervous System metastasis spinal cord compression yet definitively treat surgery and/or radiation Any evidence clinically active interstitial lung disease
